text: (bright music)
(festive holiday music)
♪ Let's decorate our Christmas tree ♪
♪ As pretty as a tree can be ♪
♪ We'll decorate and we won't stop ♪
♪ Until we put the star on top ♪
♪ First come the lights all in a line ♪
♪ Soon they'll make the whole tree shine ♪
♪ Round and round the tree they go ♪
♪ From way up high to way down low ♪
♪ Let's decorate our Christmas tree ♪
♪ As pretty as a tree can be ♪
♪ We'll decorate and we won't stop ♪
♪ Until we put the star on top ♪
♪ Next are the ornaments, big and small ♪
♪ Let's find some spots to hang them all ♪
♪ So many places they can go ♪
♪ From way up high to way down low ♪
♪ Let's decorate our Christmas tree ♪
♪ As pretty as a tree can be ♪
♪ We'll decorate and we won't stop ♪
♪ Until we put the star on top ♪

♪ Next we'll hang some
tinsel, here and there ♪
♪ To make it sparkle everywhere ♪
♪ All around the tree it goes ♪
♪ From way up high to way down low ♪
♪ Let's decorate our Christmas tree ♪
♪ As pretty as a tree can be ♪
♪ We'll decorate and we won't stop ♪
♪ Until we put the star on top ♪
♪ Last comes the star, so big and bright ♪
♪ To share with us its Christmas light ♪
♪ There's only one place it should be ♪
♪ At the very top of our Christmas tree ♪
♪ Let's decorate our Christmas tree ♪
♪ As pretty as a tree can be ♪
♪ We'll decorate and we won't stop ♪
♪ Until we put the star on top ♪
